nodes.text: Faris was a spacer during the Galactic Civil War, and was friends with Pyrron Nox and Wrune Tsallin. During a visit to a Bureau of Ships and Services office, Faris and Nox talked about Tsallin, who was working for Sprax and Jatayus Outbound. Faris informed Nox that Jatayus was a front for Black Sun. During the trip to the office, Faris and Nox learned from clerk, Lommbo, that Tsallin had been found dead, floating in the Ac'fren Spur.
